UPDATE movie_info SET mv_country = #{nations}, mv_maker = #{companys}, mv_grade = #{audits}, mv_runtime = #{showTm}, mv_genre = #{genreNm}
WHERE mv_code = #{movieCd}

UPDATE movie_info SET mv_poster =#{posters}, mv_sinop = #{plot}
WHERE REPLACE(mv_name, ' ', '') = REPLACE(#{movieNm}, ' ', '')

UPDATE movie_audience AS a INNER JOIN movie_info AS i ON a.mv_code = i.mv_code SET a.au_trailer = #{vod}, a.au_keyword = #{keywords}, a.au_img = #{stlls} WHERE REPLACE(i.mv_name, ' ', '') = REPLACE(#{movieNm}, ' ', '')
mapper.select: SELECT mi.mv_code,.mi.mv_name,mi.mv_grade,mi.mv_poster,mi.mv_sdate, mi.mv_gradeimg,ma.au_status FROM movie_info mi inner join movie_audience ma ON mi.mv_code = ma.mv_code ORDER BY mi.mv_audi_d_cnt desc
SELECT mi.mv_code,.mi.mv_name,mi.mv_grade,mi.mv_poster,mi.mv_sdate, mi.mv_gradeimg,ma.au_status FROM movie_info mi inner join movie_audience ma ON mi.mv_code = ma.mv_code ORDER BY mi.mv_rate desc
SELECT mi.mv_code,mi.mv_name,mi.mv_grade,mi.mv_poster,mi.mv_sdate, mi.mv_gradeimg,ma.au_status FROM movie_info mi JOIN movie_audience ma ON mi.mv_code = ma.mv_code ORDER BY ma.au_acccnt desc
SELECT mi.mv_code,mi.mv_name,mi.mv_grade,mi.mv_poster,mi.mv_sdate, mi.mv_gradeimg,ma.au_status FROM movie_info mi JOIN movie_audience ma ON mi.mv_code = ma.mv_code ORDER BY mi.mv_sdate desc
